ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Does this ever happen to anyone else
ygData.msgSnippet: hey there, Ha, yes that happens to me quite often, i am a wood elf ranger so feel for you hon about the whole thing, it happened to me again yesterday to be
ygData.messageBody:
hey there, Ha, yes that happens to me quite often, i am a wood elf ranger so feel for you hon about the whole thing, it happened to me again yesterday to be exact. What i do when that happens is just usually duel them and win. LOL

It tends to knock them down a notch or two, or three....hahahhahah  But if it really bothers you tell them that and then promptly leave, orrrr you can do what i did once and it kinda freaked them out, tell them that you are actaully a guy playing a girl, freaks them out really good. LOL  Be creative!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Melefant/Ranger 30

 Brangvyne <brangvyne7@...> wrote:

Salutations All!

Another question.

I was on last night and ran into this dwarf who keep asking my half
elf ranger to see her Boobies/mellons (his exact terms) for which he
offered to pay me some gold. I said no thanks and ran off and he
didn't follow me.

Has something like this happened to anyone else?
What is the correct response, what should I do, or did I handle it
right?
It bothered me but when I told the person I was grouping with they
just laughed it off, so I said no big deal and went on, but I'm not
sure. Anyway, any advice?

:o)
Brangvyne
lvl 10 wood elf ranger
Xegony (sp)
lvl 1 half elf bard
Cazic Thule (sp)
